title: FF Lesley Davis - (Adepts of Calluna) 03-Woven in Life's Tapestr
description:
Woven in Life's Tapestry

Publication Date: February 1, 2011

Summary:

All of Calluna's history is written for posterity in the Journals of the Founders.

Kincaid of Dalor is a retired Celestial Warrior. She is making it her life's work to study every Journal she can lay her hands on searching for answers. Answers to why the Journals were being slowly, but subtly, altered. History is being re-written and certain Journals are being destroyed altogether. Kincaid wants to know why.

Hickory of Kandaan is a student sent to study at Kincaid's library, to learn from Calluna's colourful history. But which history is she really there to study? The truth of Calluna's past or the deceptive lies being woven into Calluna's rich tapestry?

Kincaid knows what really happened in the Great War that took Calluna by storm.Can she trust Hickory with these truths when she can not even trust her own feelings wYour text tohe younger woman is concerned?
